title: How to release mini programs
content:
# How to release mini programs

2022-07-07 17:08

This topic introduces how to release mini programs in a workspace and what are preparations you need to make before starting the release process.

## Before you begin

Before you release mini programs, you need to get ready with some prerequisites and check how members join the creation and release process:

- [Apply for an account](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/workflow-procedures#ORRSQ)
- Complete the on-boarding process:

- For wallets: [create the tenant workspace](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/workflow-procedures)
- For merchants: [onboard to the tenant workspace](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/getting-started/merchant-on-boarding)

- [Download Mini Program Studio (IDE)](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/downloads)
- Check how [mini program member roles](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/miniprogram-member-role) collaborate to construct the mini program life cycle.

## Procedures

For a guided tour on how to release mini programs, see the following steps:

![image](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/jpeg/5956329/1634104205167-e5a1f0ec-4972-40e2-a556-a6e94742c07b.jpeg)

1. [Create mini programs](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/create)
2. [Add mini program members](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/add_member)
3. [Upload versions](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/upload)
4. [Configure mini programs](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/configure)
5. [Release versions](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/release)
6. [Generate QR codes](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/generate-qrcode)
7. [Delete mini programs](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/remove)

## More information

[Manage mini programs](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/mini-program)

[Members](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/member)

[Develop mini programs](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/developer-guide)
